About Me

I try constantly to challenge myself.
Experiences in business, software engineering, communication, and leadership have enabled me to become the professional I am today.
My main goal is to leave my mark in line with my personal ideas, drawing on my past experiences to promote the ongoing expansion of innovation in the company.

I’m Seungjo Han, a Generalist Junior Product Manager who is challenging by bumping into each other.
I led several projects and took the role as PO in Software, Business, Leadership and Design.
I do believe the positive power from the growth through overcoming limitations and making impact together with people. So I’m always trying to experience different kinds of fields and aggressively communicate as much as I can.
I feel responsible for delivering positive impact and enjoy meeting customers, making change through developing ideas no matter of the size.

2019

한국을 방문하는 여행객들에게 한국인CP(Content Provider)와 외국인CP가 함께 높은 만족도의 여행정보 및 가이드를 제공하는 서비스.
